Title: International trends in health science librarianship part 20: Russia
Abstract: © 2017 Health Libraries GroupThis is the last in a series of articles exploring international trends in health science librarianship in the 21st century. The focus of the present issue is Russia. The next feature column will initiate a new series entitled New Directions in Health Science Librarianship. The first contribution will be from Australia. JM.
